game.name: Princesses Never Lose!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as Erica, princess of the Tolinia Kingdom, as she fights to unify the Stivale Peninsula against a powerful, modernized country, that threatens to undermine the peninsula's sovereignty.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Erica, princess of the Tolinia Kingdom, as she fights to unify the Stivale Peninsula against a powerful, modernized country, that threatens to undermine the peninsula's sovereignty.

reviewHighlights.text: r-18 패치 있음. 안 받고 하면 안나오니까 헛고생하지 말고 받으셈. https://kaguragames.com/princessesneverlose-patch/ 2시간 동안 아무것도 못보고 그냥 날림
내가 살다 살다 이런 겜을 다 해보네 그런 거 말고 쯔꾸르 말이에요.
